altername_name: Barbie en La Princesa de los Animales
name: Barbie as the Island Princess
overview: Barbie as the Island Princess is a video game of the Barbie franchise. This game is a collection of 28 different mini-games. Some of the mini-games are more frustrating to play than others due to the inconsistencies in the difficulty level. Barbie can unlock new locations by succeeding at the mini-games.
